data.name: Ero Manager - adult patch
data.detailed_description:
Puzzle games, keyboard operation, in the game, you need to help the protagonist to fly up constantly, be careful of the stones that go up and down during the flight, come and challenge!
Operation method: Press the space bar to control the hero to fly, be careful not to hit the wall!
Players can click the light bulb as much as they want in the game
The game contains ten different levels
Regarding adult content, you need to click on the album to enter, and then click on the characters in the album to enter the interactive interface，All women are adults and do not include extreme sexual behaviors such as violent sexual assault.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
